definitions.definition: Flat, smooth surface produced by cleavage, or any similar surface produced by similar techniques, as in glass .
A cut (slash) or a cut location, either naturally or artificially.

main_definition: ( technology ) Flat, smooth surface produced by cleavage, or any similar surface produced by similar techniques, as in glass .
secondary_definitions: A cut (slash) or a cut location, either naturally or artificially.
